thread.title: U.S. troops not leaving Syria until goals accomplished: Haley

title: U.S. troops not leaving Syria until goals accomplished: Haley
text:
U.S. troops not leaving Syria until goals accomplished: Haley 11:19am EDT - 01:42 
U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley said on Sunday that the United States would not pull its troops out of Syria until its goals were accomplished. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
